face_detect module¶

class face_detect.FaceDectector(img_path, cascade, min_size, max_size, img_id, mod_path)[source]¶

Bases: object

run_cascade()[source]¶

Creates the cascade and run it on the object image.

Creates the Haar cascade classifier [face_cascade] and detector [face_detector] run the detection algorithm on the parsed image [self.img].

Parameters:None
Returns:faces_detect – Number of faces detected, success = 1, fail > 1, < 1. Errors will be recorded and reported at the end of the end of the analysis.
Return type:integer
to_matrix(img_faces)[source]¶

Save detected faces.

Transform the coordinates to a matrix and save as a .csv file corresponding to the image identification.

Parameters:img_faces (integer) – Array containing the integer coordingnates of the bound box drawn around the detected face.
Returns:self.err – String warning if there was more than one face detected in the image.
Return type:string
